body: The manga's synopsis is all about this dog and pony show, where Tomoe visits her little sister, then remembers anything about her stepfather not coming home, tears up, gets drugged by Asami, and voila! Tomoe is later turned into an adult baby. Did not see that coming a mile away.
damn, i feel bad for you dude, good luck

I know this stuff is fucked up but the idea of being in this kind of dynamic intoxicating. Reading this just made me cry, I got severely abused by both my parents and I dont know how to be vulnerable in any way other then this, like I really wish I was her. I'm deathly afraid of people in my life finding out about me enjoying this crap. I just wish someone loved me and made me feel safe for once. (Oops getting emo about porn again)
Uncomfortable... I'll just blacklist this an forget about it.
when you invest way too much into rape
tf is wrong with me for real xd

That chick definitely had some unresolved issues with her parents
But really this is just weird , like who would actually enjoy this
now that is some weird shit xD
seems like some sort of overly complicated rape scheme
